release_note: Video tracks increased to up to 4. Unlimited self draw undo history. Bug fixes.

Added new setting option Auto align when moving objects now you can turn off the automatic alignment feature. Added behavior selection when splitting clips with transforms. Fixed an issue where movies would not play when recording with headphones. Other bug fixes.

New features in V2.2 Movie production with transparent backgrounds using the HEVC video codec is now supported. You can set the background of your movie to be transparent and export it. And you can add videos with transparent backgrounds to your videos for editing in the App. Supports image strokes. For images with a transparent background you can now add a stroke draw an outline on it. Text borders improved. Now you can set more elegant borders for text. Text background improvements. Spacing and rounding options are provided. Shadow functionality improvements. You can change the color and radius of the shadow. New features in V2.1 Added color picker tool. You can pick a color from the preview area. Added range selection and operations. You can operate on multiple clips at once. 改进了色度键 Chromakey New features in V2.0 Redesigned movie management with folders. New Local Files to manage footage from elsewhere. New desktop UI layout on iPad. More movie aspect ratios 16:9 1:1 4:3 5:4 19.5:9 and 21:9 supporting portrait mode . The new Media Explorer helps you easily drag and drop footage to movie tracks. Insert mode and overwrite mode for tracks. Supports chroma key green screen . Redesigned self drawing tools. New recordings. 4K Ultra HD export.
Fixed YouTube uploading error. Changed Facebook uploading process. Some bug fixes.
Fixed a crash bug.
60 fps exporting supported. movie editing performance improved.
Improved iPhone X compatibility.
Fixed YouTube uploading login error. Fixed Facebook uploading problem.
Fixed YouTube uploading problem.
Improved iOS 10 compatibility. Bug fixes.
Rearranging tracks is supported now. Press and hold on a track then you can move it. 720P exporting is back. Fixed the black screen problem on iPhone 4. Other bug fixes.

Adjust colors for video picture and text. Saturation Brightness Contrast Temperature Exposure Hue and RGB color. And animatable. Crop is supported on video picture and text. And animatable More transition easing functions supported. Circular Back Elastic Bounce 2 new transitions. Movable central point for rotating. Add border shadow round corner to video. Arbitrary tracks order. Now you can put video directly on picture GIF picture animations supported 4 new sound effect tracks. Added 25 frames per second for exporting. 1080P high quality exporting supported. Bug fixes.
Improved iPhone 6s iPhone 6s plus compatibility. Bug fixes.
Fixed crashes on iOS 9.

Improved memory management. Improved picture display quality. Fine tune for transparency sound volume and text size. Added private option for YouTube uploading. 3 new music tracks and 4 new sound FX. Bug fixes.
Improved iPhone 6 iPhone 6 plus compatibility. Bug fixes.

New 1:1 square movie now supported. New Left and Right text alignment supported. New Install custom fonts into Cute CUT. New Add audio only from a video into your movie. Finer control of shadow placement. iOS8 compatibility. Save user habits for text and picture properties. Many small adjustments. Bug fixes.
Fixed the app crashing at startup after upgraded to Pro on some iOS 7 devices.

New Slow fast motion Adjust video speed from 0.25X to 4X now supported. New Transition on Image Text now has Ease In Ease Out effects. New Change background color of your movie. New Export import movie project to from iTunes. Cancel compressing video picked from Camera Roll. Support opening media file from other apps. Add preview for videos in File Sharing. Add progress for Facebook uploading. Bug fixes.

Optimized memory comsumption to reduce app crashing. When recording voice also play the video in the background. New Full screen preview supported. New 5 languages added: French Italian Portuguese Russian Korean. Bug fixes.
New 4 languages added: German Spanish Japanese Traditional Chinese Bug fixes

NEW Undo previous steps of operation now supported. NEW Split segment now supported. NEW Grab still image from video segment. NEW Hollow text is supported. Fixed to avoid segments overlapped in same track. Fixed no sound issue when the device in silent ringtone state. Popup pre defined transitions list by one tap. Now you can re activate the help tips for beginners. Bug fixes.
Crash issue on iPhone 5 iPad 4 fixed! NEW Supports fixed cover image in Movies page. Bug fixes.
Low memory may cause the app to exit abnormally. Message box added to recommend user to restart the device. Memory management improved. Facebook uploading issue fixed. Bug fixes.
